page.title: 03Looking at Milton Common (2)
page.content:
On Friday we went for a walk at Milton Common.We had to count how many houses,bungalows,garages & hotels there were.I saw 14 houses,2 bungalows, 1 garage and a County Council Depot. There was an unfinished house as well. Most of the houses were modern and made of brick with tiles on their roof.The unfinished house was having its tiles put on its roof. It was very noisy because the M40 was just behind the Council Depot's fence. The cars went very fast along the A40 London Road where we were walking and we had to remember our Green X Code. Another group was looking at the other part of Milton Common.
by Jane Flynn.
